name: La Coctelera Social
tagline: The best cocktails for your company
description: We could tell you that we are a creative bar, that our customers are soaked with our experience and professionalism, that among our ingredients highlight the passion and the desire to do things well, that our cocktails are the best you have ever been able to taste ... But no, We are not going to explain all that to you We prefer to invite you to meet us and try our "letter". In it you will find everything that your company may need. Come in and serve yourself!
